messages.subject: Harry Potter chemistry kits on sale
messages.msgSnippet: A year ago, I bought some really cool Harry Potter chemistry kits. They came with wands and a cauldron, and lots of other cool stuff. They were originally sold
messages.messageBody:
A year ago, I bought some really cool Harry Potter chemistry kits.
They came with wands and a cauldron, and lots of other cool stuff.
They were originally sold by Scholastic Books for $12.99 (or so) a
piece. However, I found a company that sold them as a complete set
for much cheaper. Now they are going out of business due to a family
emergency and need to sell all of their stock. The Harry Potter kits
(which are new and have never been opened) are now 50% off at $10.75
for 11 kits and $18.98 for 13 kits (each kit comes in it's own
enclosed Scholastic envelope). I can't say enough about these kits.
Each one is jam packed with stuff to do and lots of extras! At their
website you can look at each kit individually to get an idea of what
they contain. The kits are no longer available, so they are not easy
to find. If you want me to bring them to our next meeting, I can do
that, so you can see.

Here's the website:

http://homeandfamily.biz/store/harry-potter-activity-kits-c-22.html

Take care!

Marla
